meanings.definition: One million pixels, used as a unit of measurement in digital imaging.
meanings.sent1: The new camera boasts a high megapixel count for clear photos.
meanings.sent2: My phone's camera has a resolution of 12 megapixels.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally zoomed in too much and the megapixel count made my face look like a mosaic.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was so detailed, it seemed like each brushstroke was a separate megapixel.
meanings.sent5: The megapixel count on the screen showed how sharp the image was.

meanings.definition: A camera or image sensor that is capable of capturing one million pixels in a single image.
meanings.sent1: The latest smartphone model features an advanced megapixel camera.
meanings.sent2: Photographers often prefer cameras with higher megapixel capabilities.
meanings.sent3: The detective used a special megapixel camera to zoom in on the suspect's face.
meanings.sent4: The megapixel sensor in the security camera captured every detail of the intruder.
meanings.sent5: The quality of the picture was outstanding due to the high megapixel count of the camera.
